thread.title: Great place, excellent value
thread.title_full: Great place, excellent value - Review of Adria Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: EandNandthecat
title: Great place, excellent value
text:
Just stayed here with our 14 year old niece in one of their family rooms. I totally agree with many of the other reviews; the rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable.
The team is very welcoming, helpful and breakfast is lovely.
Easy short walk to Hammersmith tube station.
Excellent value for money in London!
